instructions: On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google Photos app . Sign in to your Google Account. At the bottom, tap For you . To choose the photos and videos you want in the movie, tap New Movie. Select your photos or videos. At the top right, tap Create. When you re done, tap Save. To use a theme, tap the movie you want and follow the instructions. To see your movie, tap Play .

On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google Photos app . Sign in to your Google Account. At the bottom, tap For you . At the top, select Animation or Collage . Choose the photos to add to your animation or collage. At the top right, tap Create .
